    • build

      public DynamicallyAnnotatedGraph<V,E> build()
      Constructs a DynamicallyAnnotatedGraph from the current state of the builder.

      This method:

      1. Creates a new AdjacencySetStatus object to track validation issues.
      2. Attempts to build an AdjacencySets instance from the adjacencyBuilder.
      3. If the adjacency sets are invalid, throws an IllegalStateException.
      4. Otherwise, constructs a new DynamicallyAnnotatedGraph using the validated adjacency sets and the current vertex and edge annotations.
      Returns:
      a ShrinkableGraph instance
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the adjacency sets are invalid from status
